unnormalised: Campus hiring is crucial for organizations like ours. We've had great success recruiting from IIT Delhi and IIM Ahmedabad. Targeting talent early, say by 15/08/2024, helps build a strong pipeline. This year, we're planning a session at BITS Pilani around 14:00 hrs on 20/09/2024. Last year, we offered Rs. 10 LPA. We hope to improve that this year. Also, consider regional colleges in Maharashtra. Recruitment process at 10:00 hrs on 25/12/2024.
normalised: Campus hiring is crucial for organizations like ours. We've had great success recruiting from I I T Delhi and I I M Ahmedabad. Targeting talent early, say by fifteenth august two thousand and twenty four, helps build a strong pipeline. This year, we're planning a session at B I T S Pilani around fourteen hundred hours on twentieth september two thousand and twenty four. Last year, we offered rupee ten L P A. We hope to improve that this year. Also, consider regional colleges in Maharashtra. Recruitment process at ten hundred hours on twenty fifth december two thousand and twenty four.
